pull.title: wallet: Use boost to more portably ensure -wallet specifies only a filename

events.message: wallet: Use boost to more portably ensure -wallet specifies only a filename

events.body:
utACK https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/10226/commits/a4186dd23944b0b803523632e1578d5c4ebb9e57
We definitely shouldn't be hardcoding path characters (didn't know this was already the case in the existing code).
